name: Wedding Crashers
description: You finally found the moon girl of your dreams... only to find out that she is marrying someone else! Luckily, she lost her ring, and the wedding can not go on until someone finds it. Could that someone be you? From alien encounters to secret underground mazes to broken spaceships, you better be one brave space cadet to complete this mission. If you can make it back in one piece, you will halt her "Save the Date" and save the day! Good luck!
